bioconda.name: bioconductor-pvac
bioconda.summary: PCA-based gene filtering for Affymetrix arrays

biotools.summary: The package contains a function for filtering genes by the Proportion of Variation ACcounted for by the first principal component.

bioschemas.name: pvac
bioschemas.summary: The package contains a function for filtering genes by the Proportion of Variation ACcounted for by the first principal component.
